Modpacks.Name: Survival Default Kit
Modpacks.Creator: Matix
Modpacks.Description:
# Survival Default Kit

A simple Modpack containing the things you need to get an improved Vanilla Minecraft experience.  
This Modpack includes:
- Damage Indicator
- Mini- and Worldmap
- Shulker Tooltips
- OptiFine
- Inventory sorting
- crafting Mods

This Modpack also includes:
- VanillaTwerks texture pack
- vanillareborn shaderpack

Modpacks.Name: OptiFine for Forge 1.16.4
Modpacks.Creator: Matix
Modpacks.Description: Simply OptiFine for Minecraft 1.16.4. Served using Minecraft Forge.
